article_node.title: Applied Materials stock falls on Q4 outlook
article_node.summary: Applied Materials reported a third quarter adjusted EPS of 248, exceeding the consensus of 236, and net sales of 7.3 billion, surpassing expectations of 7.21 billion. However, their Q4 sales forecast of 6.2 to 7.2 billion fell short of the consensus of 7.32 billion, leading to an 11% drop in stock price after hours. The discussion also highlighted concerns about trade policies with China and the competitive landscape in the chip sector, where missing forecasts can significantly impact stock performance.
